list.name: Changes
list.comment: 1) Implemented fullscreen mode with dynamic UI scaling 2) Added settings menu with ESC key support 3) Music and SFX volume controls with logarithmic scaling 4) Fixed memory leaks in SoundManager with proper resource cleanup 5) Optimized code organization with constants and better error handling 6) Centered title and fixed About Us text display 7) Added animated loading screen with "Loading..." dots 8) Removed mute button (replaced by settings menu) 9) Fixed volume slider artifacts and improved UI consistency 10) Enhanced all panels for proper fullscreen scaling
